Module kivakit.core.kernel

Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.threading

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KivaKitThread
    A thread with methods to start, pause, resume and stop (pause and resume are implemented only in RepeatingKivaKitThread).
    RepeatingKivaKitThread
    A thread that repeatedly executes the KivaKitThread.onRun() method implementation at a given Frequency.
    Retry
    Retry running a Runnable
    Threads
    Methods for working with threads and ExecutorService.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KivaKitThread.State
    The execution states a thread can be in
